metadata.title: CVE-2024-22365 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
pam_namespace local denial of service

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-cracklib - 1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7
libpam-modules - 1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7
libpam-modules-bin - 1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7
libpam-runtime - 1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7
libpam0g - 1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pam package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-5ubuntu4.7').
